SamPy.astronomy.differentialfunctions.stellarMassFunction¶

SamPy.astronomy.differentialfunctions.stellarMassFunction(data, wght=None, mmin=None, mmax=None, nbins=40, h=0.7, volume=50, nvols=8, verbose=False, early_type_galaxies=0.4, central_galaxy_id=1)¶

Calculates a stellar mass function from data. Calculates stellar mass functions for all galaxies, early- and late-types and central galaxies separately.

Parameters:
  • data (dictionary) – should in the following format: data[‘stellar_mass’] = [] data[‘bulge_mass’] = [] data[‘galaxy_id’] = []
Returns:

output
Return type:

dictionary
